revision.revremark: Derived from userID.xml rev.8 - Add tooltip for SoundTraxx Tsunami decoders
Minor tooltip update + change of labels

variable.label: User ID #1 - firmware version
Id Utente #1 - firmware version
CV Utilisateur #1 - firmware version
Benutzer-CV #1 - firmware version
Uživatel ID #1 - firmware version
Gebruiker-CV #1 - firmware version
variable.tooltip:
Contains firmware version.
Can be programmed to any value from 0 to 255.
Will return to the software’s revision code
when the decoder is reset to factory settings.

variable.label: User ID #2 - default CV set
Id Utente #2 - default CV set
CV Utilisateur #2 - default CV set
Benutzer-CV #2 - default CV set
Uživatel ID #2 - default CV set
Gebruiker-CV #2 - default CV set
variable.tooltip:
Contains the default CV set.
Can be used to determine the OEM part number.
Can be programmed to any value from 0 to 255.
Will return to the default CV set value
when the decoder is reset to factory settings.
